import java.util.*;
class test {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
        int n;

            n = sc.nextInt();
            if(isPrime(n))
                System.out.println(1);
            else
                System.out.println(sum(n)-n);
    }

    static int sum(int n) {
        int sum, c = 0, p = 2;
        while(n%p==0) {
            n = n/p;
            c++;
        }
        sum = (int)(Math.pow(p, c+1)-1);
        p = 3;
        while(n>0&&p<=Math.sqrt(n)) {
            c = 0;
            while(n%p==0) {
                n = n/p;
                c++;
            }

            sum = sum * (int)(Math.pow(p, c+1)-1)/(p-1);

            p = p + 2;
        }
        if(n>1)
            sum = sum * (n+1);

        return sum;
    }

    static boolean isPrime(int n) {
        if(n<2)
            return false;
        else if(n==2||n==3)
            return true;
        else if(n%2==0||n%3==0)
            return false;
        else if(n<25)
            return true;
        else
            for(int f=5;f<=Math.sqrt(n);f=f+6)
                if(n%f==0||n%(f+2)==0)
                    return false;
        return true;
    }
}
